text:
Alison Rosamund King (born 3 March 1973) is an English actress and model. She is known for her television roles as Lynda Block in the Sky One drama series, "Dream Team", and in the long-running ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street" as Mrs. Fanshaw and later as Carla Connor. She won Best Actress at the 2012 British Soap Awards.
King is considered by the press as a British sex symbol.
